definition: to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: You don't do a fitting when you buy a store-bought suit.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是成衣店購買的衣服，就不可能試穿修改。

sentences.english: By the end of the century, the men's ready-to-wear apparel industry was well established.
sentences.chinese: 到了該世紀末，男式成衣業已經牢固地建立起來了。

sentences.english: Experience trying on the slopwork , custom-tailor more relieved.
sentences.chinese: 成衣試穿體驗，定做更放心。

sentences.english: Foolishly however, I got lost taking an alternate route to the tailor shop.
sentences.chinese: 但我在另選路線去成衣鋪時竟傻巴拉嘰的迷路了。

sentences.english: This has left garment manufacturers in Asia bracing for higher costs.
sentences.chinese: 這使得亞洲的成衣生產商的成本也隨之升高。

sentences.english: You can often find great bargains in Los Angeles's garment district.
sentences.chinese: 你總能在洛杉磯的成衣交易區買到物美價廉的衣服。

sentences.english: The garments are magnificent and tasteful and have long enjoyed great fame both at home and aboard.
sentences.chinese: 這種成衣華麗而美觀，在國內外享有很高的聲譽。

sentences.english: Street restaurant with this unconventional compared have very unique place.
sentences.chinese: 本店與本條街的成衣店相比較有很獨特的地方。

sentences.english: Side gussets are made of self fabric .
sentences.chinese: 成衣無側縫的，用本身布面料拼幅。

sentences.english: This paper also introduced the problem and solutions in ready-to-wear clothes production.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了成衣生產中遇到的問題及解決辦法。

sentences.english: Shopping malls selling designer clothes and luxury hotels have sprung up.
sentences.chinese: 購物中心出售時尚成衣，豪華旅館如雨後春筍。

sentences.english: The ready-made garments industry is thriving, surpassed globally only by China and Turkey.
sentences.chinese: 成衣產業在全世界位列中國和土耳其之後傲視全球。

sentences.english: Hence the research and development of high-quality clothes aren't without foundation at all.
sentences.chinese: 因而對高級成衣的與開發的研究就不顯得無憑無據。

sentences.english: The dress maker gathered the skirt.
In apparel industry , end - product quality is affected by a lot of factors.
sentences.chinese: 在成衣製造行業，成品的質量受到許多因素的影響。

definition: Jacquard weave (machine weaving leaving protruding pattern)
